title: $1,000 Oceanic Open League (Grass Route tournament)

embed.description: Two days of action kicking off with: Day oneGroup Stage with round robin tournamentDay twoSingle Elimination faceoff At...

body:
Welcome to the Oceanic Open League:
Restrictions include no OPL or OCS teams.
This is a grass routes tournament.

It will go on for 7 regular weeks with the 8 week being playoffs.
Team earn points for each week of attendance and the top 8 on the ladder go to week 8 for a chance to win $1,000 prize pool.

There are RP prizes on the weekly for team so dont miss out. 
Based on the success of this tournament we will be bringer bigger and better tournaments to the league of legends grass routes scene.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sign up to week 1 here:
https://battlefy.com/oceanic-gaming/oceanic-open-league-week-1/5cc8395f3ee0ff032d93bf31/info?infoTab=schedule&fbclid=IwAR2JtaRhzy6-YyfCgTeeOWbZ1-Nrnc274dOevJpR8oAlkwx5c1fzUZVvJRo
